trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element that provides facilities for presenting content in an ordered or unordered list.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于在有序列表或无序列表中呈现内容的功能的块级别流内容元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。

trans-unit.source: See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> content model.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[TextElement 内容模型概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>内容模型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> is a flow content element designed to be formatted with markers such as bullets or numbering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> 设计为可如项目符号或编号的标记的格式设置的流内容元素。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem> elements are the only permissible children for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem> 元素是仅允许子<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and populate a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建并填充<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Ordered list](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "Screenshot: Ordered list")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 排序列表](~/add/media/ordered-list.png "屏幕快照： 有序列的表")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a nested <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> (lists within lists) using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义嵌套<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>（在列表中列出） 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了此示例的呈现效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Nested list](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "Nested list")
trans-unit.target: ![嵌套列表](~/add/media/flow-nested-list-example.png "嵌套列表")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 类的新的空实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> 对象，它指定新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 的初始内容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 类的一个新实例，将指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> 对象作为新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 的初始内容。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> elements that comprise the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection" />，其中包含组成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> 的内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> elements that comprise the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection" />，其中包含组成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> 的内容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 元素。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.ListItemCollection>此属性来枚举或操作的内容返回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>元素。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show how to perform common operations on a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List> using the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.ListItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行常见操作<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List>使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.List.ListItems%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired distance between the contents of each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> element, and the near edge of the list marker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置每个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.ListItem" /> 元素的内容和列表标记的近边缘之间所需的距离。

trans-unit.source: A double value specifying the desired distance between list content and the near edge of list markers, in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 指定列表内容和列表标记近边缘之间所需距离的双精度值，以设备独立像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: A value of <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> (equivalent to an attribute value of "<c>Auto</c>") causes the marker offset to be determined automatically.
trans-unit.target: 值为<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />(等效于特性值的"<c>自动</c>") 会导致标记偏移量自动确定。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: String representation of a <xref:System.Double> value equal to or greater than **0.0** but smaller than <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref:System.Double>值等于或大于**0.0**但小于<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity>。

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 未限定的值，以设备无关的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字符串不需要显式包括位小数。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值，上文所述 (除外`Auto`) 后跟一个以下单元说明符： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （默认值） 是 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: Auto
trans-unit.target: 自动

trans-unit.source: Causes the marker offset to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 会导致根据当前字体特征自动确定标记偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent to a property value of <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 等效于属性值的<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerOffset" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the marker style for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.List" /> 的标记样式。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle" /> enumeration specifying the marker style to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle" /> 枚举的一个成员，指定要使用的标记样式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle.Disc" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle.Disc" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.MarkerStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting index for labeling the items in an ordered list.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于标记有序列表中的项的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The starting index for labeling items in an ordered list.
trans-unit.target: 用于标记有序列表中的项的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **1**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**1**。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on unordered lists.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不起上未经排序的列表。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.List.StartIndex" /> 依赖项属性。
